messages.title: Still here for the Community, still here for you
messages.content: Over the past 30 years I have had the privilege to work for my home towns of Gillingham and Rainham; as Member of Parliament for 13 years and more recently voluntarily as Chair of Medway Citizens Advice, Governor of Brompton Academy, Patron of local CLIC Sargent charity, Danny’s Angels and the Medway Dragons.

messages.title: Understanding Local Neighborhood Issues
messages.content: I know the importance of the local neighbourhood around wherever we live; to value that place it is important that I understand the issues and challenges you are facing.

leaflet.personalStatement: So calling at your home helps us build a better, fairer neighbourhood in your community.

politicalExperience.role: Patron of local CLIC Sargent charity, Danny’s Angels and the Medway Dragons

images.caption: Paul Clark pictured with local scenery including a church.
